definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: The National Weather Service had predicted that the river would crest to about 19 feet above flood stage.
sentences.chinese: 国家气象台曾预报红河将上涨到洪水位以上19英尺。

sentences.english: Heavy rainfall has caused water levels of the Liujiang River to rise. (ChinaFotoPress/Getty Images)
sentences.chinese: 强降雨已造成了柳江的水位上升。

sentences.english: Low water levels caused the country's largest hydropower dam to be shut down last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月，低水位使得肯尼亚最大的水力大坝被迫关闭。

sentences.english: As of noon on Saturday, the water had risen to within 20 meters of the mine opening.
sentences.chinese: 截至星期六中午，水位已上升到距矿井口约20米处。

sentences.english: Lack of rain sank the reservoirs.
Intermittent showers pushed up water levels to record highs in two dams in Leizhou yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 间歇性阵雨推高水位纪录高点在两个水坝雷州昨天。

sentences.english: According to Fan, changing the water level strains them.
sentences.chinese: 根据范晓的说法，水位的改变使断层紧绷。

sentences.english: The use of emergent flood dispatching is under the conditions of the water level in Shashi Hydrological Station.
sentences.chinese: 启用非常调度方式是以沙市水位作为控制判定条件的。

sentences.english: Research of Eco-water Table and Rational Depth of Groundwater of Tarim River Drainage Basin;
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了恢复海河流域地下水生态水位的措施。

sentences.english: Then the paper talks about the application of this Sensor in water-level meter.
sentences.chinese: 另外，还谈到了这种传感器在水位计中的应用。

sentences.english: For three days the water in the village wells roseand fell, rose and fell.
sentences.chinese: 三天来，村子的水井中的水位升升落落不停。

sentences.english: Water tables in parts of India and China have dropped catastrophically in the last few years.
sentences.chinese: 过去几年里中国和印度部分地区的地下水位严重下降。

sentences.english: These wells should provide data related to possible pre-seismic, co-seismic, or post-seismic water level fluctuations.
sentences.chinese: 这些井可提供震前，震中或震后水位升降的资料。

sentences.english: Water tables are falling throughout the northern half of China.
sentences.chinese: 中国的北半部，地下水位普遍下降。

sentences.english: The water-table has been lowered by drought.
sentences.chinese: 地下水位因干旱已降低。

sentences.english: On the Flood Control Measures in Zhujiang Delta;
sentences.chinese: 分析了珠江三角洲网河区水位变化特征。

definition: period of low water level (winter in north China)
